resources.string: Check your Java Ranking & Grade in minutes!
Get three new questions every day!
Rank and grade yourself among Java Developer Community in less than 2 minutes!
You get 3 fresh random questions every day! Get points for each right answer. No negative marking!
You get even more points if you answer them quickly!
That\'s it! You get your Daily and All-Time Ranks!
Get my three questions for the day!
